sentence.Network_en: King was a worldwide symbol of non-violent protest against racial injustice.
sentence.Network_cn: 金是全世界非暴力抗议种族不平等运动的象征。

sentence.Network_en: Anger at injustice formed his character.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不公正现象的愤怒塑造了他的性格。

sentence.Network_en: The article does them both an injustice.
sentence.Network_cn: 那篇文章对他们俩都不公。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin injustitia, from in- 'not' + justus 'just, right'

entry.def: Injustice is a lack of fairness in a situation.

example.tran: 他们将继续与不公平现象作斗争。

example.ex: They resented the injustices of the system.
example.tran: 他们怨恨制度的种种不公。

entry.tran: 不公正地评判;不公正地对待
entry.def: If you say that someone has done you an injustice, you mean that they have been unfair in the way that they have judged you or treated you.

example.ex: The article does them both an injustice.
example.tran: 那篇文章对他们俩都不公。

means.word_mean: 2. the practice of being unjust or unfair

auth_sentence.content: This is injustice, no one can accept that.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is injustice, no one can accept that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is injustice, no one can accept that.

auth_sentence.content: This wasn't the time for songs of injustice.
auth_sentence.res_content: This wasn't the time for songs of injustice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This wasn't the time for songs of injustice.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe global warming is retribution for that political injustice?
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe global warming is retribution for that political injustice?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe global warming is retribution for that political injustice?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+significant有意义的→adj.无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒
in向内,成为,进入,使……+hale气→进气,吸气
in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

Sentence.sentence: Let us hope these do not include banning gender pronouns,policing children's play, implementing more gender quotas, or treating women's special attachment to home and family as a social injustice.

Barack Obama's family is such a salient (出色的) image, we generalise it and fail to see the larger picture—that there's injustice in every aspect of American life," says Cheryl Kaiser of the University of Washington in Seattle.

sentences.en: They complained of injustice in the way they had been treated.
sentences.cn: 他们抱怨受到不公平的对待。

sentences.en: We may have been doing him an injustice. This work is good.
sentences.cn: 我们可能冤枉他了，这件工作干得不错。
